line.comment: * $t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= 'Default equipment', alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= 350

sval.val: $t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= 'Default equipment', alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= 350
add custom dynamic menu item to array $Menu: text=$t return value='tuning'
